alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jasper; Jones; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jasper, southeastern Smith, northeastern Covington and northwestern Jones Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hebron, or 8 miles southwest of Stringer, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stringer around 145 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Soso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and east central Mississippi.
